member.summary: Summary description for Utils.

member.name: T:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.ClientEvents
member.summary: Represents a control that provides a way to initialize the event handlers of the report viewer.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.ClientEvents.RenderingBegin
member.summary: Attach the event handler that will be called when the rendering of the report begins.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.ClientEvents.RenderingEnd
member.summary: Attach the event handler that will be called when the rendering of the report ends.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.ClientEvents.PrintBegin
member.summary: Attach the event handler that will be called prior to starting the print report command.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.ClientEvents.PrintEnd
member.summary: Attach the event handler that will be called when the print document (Adobe PDF) is ready for download, but prior to being send to the printer.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.ClientEvents.ExportBegin
member.summary: Attach the event handler that will be called prior to starting the report export command.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.ClientEvents.ExportEnd
member.summary: Attach the event handler that will be called when the exported document is ready for download, but prior to the actual downloading.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.ClientEvents.PageReady
member.summary: Attach the event handler that will be called every time a page from the report is rendered and ready for display.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.ClientEvents.UpdateUi
member.summary: Attach the event handler that will be called every time the UI needs an update; can be used for changing the UI of the report viewer while interacting with the reports.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.ClientEvents.Error
member.summary: Attach the event handler that will be called when an error occurs.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.ClientEvents.Ready
member.summary: Attach the event handler that will be called when the report viewer template is loaded.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.ClientEvents.InteractiveActionExecuting
member.summary: Attach the event handler that will be called when an action is being executed.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.ClientEvents.InteractiveActionEnter
member.summary: Attach the event handler that will be called when the mouse cursor enters the area of a report item's action.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.ClientEvents.InteractiveActionLeave
member.summary: Attach the event handler that will be called when the mouse cursor leaves the area of a report item's action.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.ClientEvents.ViewerToolTipOpening
member.summary: Attach the event handler that will be called when a tooltip is being opened.

member.summary: Adds/updates an enumerable of objects to/in the .

remarks.para: The objects returned from the enumerable are appended to the end of the or updated in place.

member.summary: Attach the parameter editor that will handle parameters that have provided AvailableValues and MultiValue set to true.

member.summary: Attach the parameter editor that will handle DateTime parameters.

member.summary: Attach the parameter editor that will handle Numeric parameters.

member.summary: Attach the parameter editor that will handle Boolean parameters.

member.summary: Attach the parameter editor that will handle non defined parameters.

member.summary: Attach parameter editors that can handle custom scenarios. For example MultiValue parameter of DateTime type. Custom editors are added before all other editors, in the specified order.

member.name: T:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.SendEmail
member.summary: Provides a class for the send e-mail message options. Contains the enabled property, the preselected rendering Format, from and to e-mail addresses.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.SendEmail.Enabled
member.summary: Indicates whether to show the send e-mail button

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.SendEmail.From
member.summary: A valid e-mail for the e-mail message FROM address. This field is required if empty the user should set it in the Send Mail Message dialog. The users can modify this value in the Send Mail Message dialog. The SendMailMessage implementation should accept the specified FROM e-mail address.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.SendEmail.To
member.summary: A valid e-mail for the e-mail message TO address. This field is required if empty the user should set it in the Send Mail Message dialog. The users can modify this value in the Send Mail Message dialog. The SendMailMessage implementation should accept the specified TO e-mail address.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.SendEmail.CC
member.summary: A valid e-mail for the e-mail message CC address. This field is optional. The users can modify this value in the Send Mail Message dialog. The SendMailMessage implementation should accept the specified CC e-mail addresses.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.SendEmail.Subject
member.summary: A string used for the MailMessage Subject value. This field is optional. The users can modify this value in the Send Mail Message dialog. The SendMailMessage implementation should accept the specified e-mail subject.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.SendEmail.Body
member.summary: A string used for the MailMessage Body value. This field is optional. The users can modify this value in the Send Mail Message dialog. The SendMailMessage implementation should accept the specified e-mail body.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.SendEmail.Format
member.summary: The preselected rendering format. The users can modify this value in the Send Mail Message dialog.

member.name: M:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.SendEmail.#ctor
member.summary: The default constructor.

member.summary: Provides a class for the report source. This is a class that contains the collection of parameter values, report identifier and type

member.summary: A collection of parameter values passed to the object when initialized.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.ReportSource.Identifier
member.summary: The report identifier.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.ReportSource.IdentifierType
member.summary: The type of the report identifier.

member.name: M:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.ReportSource.#ctor
member.summary: The default constructor.

member.name: T:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.ReportViewer
member.summary: Represents the ReportViewer control.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.ReportViewer.ServiceUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets the URL of the service which will provide the report viewer with reports. The service must be properly configured so that the report viewer can successfully communicate with the server. For more information on how to configure the service please check https://docs.telerik.com/reporting/embedding-reports/host-the-report-engine-remotely/telerik-reporting-rest-services/overview.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.ReportViewer.ReportServer
member.summary: Gets or sets the connection data of the report server that hosts the report. The report server should have its Guest account enabled and with configured permissions for accessing the report. For more information see https://www.telerik.com/help/reporting/html5-report-viewer-howto-use-it-with-reportserver.html.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.ReportViewer.SendEmail
member.summary: Gets or sets contains the send e-mail functionality configuration. The enabled property, the preselected rendering Format, from and to e-mail addresses.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.ReportViewer.Parameters
member.summary: Gets or sets contains the parameters settings configuration. The Editors object, that defind the parameters editors types .

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.ReportViewer.AuthenticationToken
member.summary: Gets or sets the encoded authentication token used to authenticate the requests.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.ReportViewer.TemplateUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets the URL for the report viewer template. The template can be edited - new functionalities can be added and not needed ones can be removed. For more information please check https://www.telerik.com/help/reporting/html5-report-viewer-templates.html.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.ReportViewer.InitialPageAreaImageUrl
member.summary: Gets or sets the image URL for the PageArea background image. Used only when the parameter values are missing or invalid.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.ReportViewer.ReportSource
member.summary: Gets or sets the for the report displayed in the viewer.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.ReportViewer.PrintMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the print mode of the viewer. Three modes exist currently: AutoSelect - Specifies that the viewer should automatically determine how to print: through the browser's PDF plug-in or through export to a PDF file. ForcePDFPlugin - Specifies that the viewer should always use the PDF plugin regardless of the browser's version and settings. ForcePDFFile - Specifies that the viewer should always export the report document to PDF format with the 'print' script enabled.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.ReportViewer.ViewMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the viewer's view mode. PrintPreview - Displays the paginated report as if it is printed on paper. Interactivity is not enabled. Interactive - Displays the report in its original width and height with no paging. Additionally interactivity is enabled.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.ReportViewer.PageMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the viewer's page mode. SinglePage - Displays only one report page in PageArea container. ContinuousScroll - Displays large amount of report pages by appending additional pages on demand.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.ReportViewer.ParametersAreaPosition
member.summary: Gets or sets the viewer's parameters area position.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.ReportViewer.DocumentMapAreaPosition
member.summary: Gets or sets the viewer's document map area position.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.ReportViewer.ScaleMode
member.summary: Gets or sets the scale mode of the viewer. Three modes exist currently: FitPage - The whole report will fit on the page (will zoom in or out), regardless of its width and height. FitPageWidth - The report will be zoomed in or out so that the width of the screen and the width of the report match. Specific - Uses the scale to zoom in and out the report.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.ReportViewer.Scale
member.summary: Gets or sets zoom level of the report. 1.0 is equal to 100%, i.e. the original size of the report.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.ReportViewer.DocumentMapVisible
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the viewer’s document map is initially visible.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.ReportViewer.ParametersAreaVisible
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the viewer’s parameters area is initially visible.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.ReportViewer.PageNumber
member.summary: Gets or sets the current page number of the report.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.ReportViewer.PersistSession
member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the viewer’s client state will be persisted between the page refreshes (ex. postbacks). The state is stored in the browser’s sessionStorage and is available for the duration of the page session.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.ReportViewer.KeepClientAlive
member.summary:
Gets or sets a value indicating whether the client will be kept alive.
When set to true a request will be sent to the server to stop the client from expiring, determined by the ClientSessionTimeout server configuration
When set to false, the client will be left to be expired

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.ReportViewer.DisabledButtonClass
member.summary: Gets or sets the class to be used by buttons in the disabled state.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.WebForms.ReportViewer.CheckedButtonClass
member.summary: Gets or sets the class to be used by buttons in the checked state.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether script initialization statement will be deferred.

member.summary: Gets or sets represents a control that provides a way to initialize the parameter editors of the report viewer.

member.summary: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the search metadata will be delivered on demand or by default.

member.summary: Sets the scale mode of the viewer

member.summary: The whole report will fit on the page (will zoom in or out), regardless of its width and height.

member.summary: The report will be zoomed in or out so that the width of the screen and the width of the report match.

member.summary: The URL of the Telerik Report Server instance

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.Common.ReportServer.Username
member.summary: A valid username that exists in Report Server registered users. Empty in order to use the built-in Guest account. Either usage requires configured server permissions for accessing the report.

member.name: P:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.Common.ReportServer.Password
member.summary: The password associated with the username. Empty when Username is not set

member.name: M:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.Common.ReportServer.#ctor
member.summary: The default constructor.

member.name: T:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.Common.ScaleMode
member.summary: Sets the scale mode of the viewer

member.name: F:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.Common.ScaleMode.FitPage
member.summary: The whole report will fit on the page (will zoom in or out), regardless of its width and height.

member.name: F:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.Common.ScaleMode.FitPageWidth
member.summary: The report will be zoomed in or out so that the width of the screen and the width of the report match.

member.name: F:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.Common.ScaleMode.Specific
member.summary: Uses the scale to zoom in and out the report.

member.name: T:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.Common.ViewMode
member.summary: Specifies whether the viewer is in interactive or print preview mode

member.name: F:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.Common.ViewMode.Interactive
member.summary: Displays the report in its original width and height with no paging. Additionally interactivity is enabled.

member.name: F:Telerik.ReportViewer.Html5.Common.ViewMode.PrintPreview
member.summary: Displays the paginated report as if it is printed on paper. Interactivity is not enabled.
